Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photograph shows Rihanna holding the flag of Pakistan.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is stated that the photograph is fake and was created by altering an image of Rihanna at a cricket match.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the photograph is genuine without providing any evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim provides an alternative explanation for the origin of the photograph, stating that it was created to circulate after Rihanna drew attention to farmers in India.
